title: Eternum Cassio's summoner icon and the way it appears on the summoner profile
body:
The focus seems to be too much on her forehead whereas her mouth is cut off by the design of the summoner profile. That's not very pleasant to look at. 

Don't you think the alignment could be a bit better on this one? Maybe you could move things a little bit up for her?

https://i.imgur.com/x3Vx6Oe.png

replies.body: A lot of icons share this problem and it's really triggering my OCD.
It's all fault of circles. Circles casted this suffering upon us. Circles betrayed us. Kill all circles. Let the squares rule supreme.
squares or just the mighty hero called ZOOM (out)

They just need to shrink the icons.

Hey! 

We chatted on Twitter, but for visibility's sake, I'll reply here, too. 

I checked it out with Riot Time Wizard, and it doesn't look like what you're showing on our end. It may be an issue of screen res, which isn't something my team is responsible for. It'd be a larger scaling issue with the client. This is something I'll be looking into today, but I have a feeling it isn't an issue with the icon itself. Could also be an issue with the UI? I've got a few things I need to check out. :P 

This is what we're seeing - I don't know why the numbers are misplaced, we're on an internal testing build, but it mirrors PBE/Live. 

https://imgur.com/nVFCCnx
https://imgur.com/ms4LazG

*If anyone else owns this icon and could provide a screenshot, I'd appreciate it!*

Hi, I appreciate you guys trying to fix this issue! I have the same problem, here's an image of the Cass icon:

https://prnt.sc/hggpqz

The same thing happens with every other icon I own (which is almost all of them), here is Boki+Baki and Project Leona:

https://prnt.sc/hggq09
https://prnt.sc/hggqgg
Oh god that Boki and Baki one looks so awful

At this point I wish they'd just listen to feedback and remove the circle icons and give us back the squares. I don't really care if it 'might look different based on your resolution'. People prefer the square.
